gpu_get_blendmode: This function can be used to retrieve the current blend mode being used for drawing. The returned value will be one of the following constants (the default value is <tt>bm_normal</tt>):
Additive blending. Luminosity values of light areas are added.
Subtractive blending. Luminosity values of light areas are subtracted.
Max blending. Similar to additive blending.
The above code gets the current blend mode and if it is not <tt>bm_normal</tt> it is set to that constant.
